marketinginformation: the Ik-6410a Economically Meets The Needs of Round-the-clock Video Surveillance. With 10-bit Digital Signal Processing (dsp), The Ik-6410a Delivers Clear, Sharp Video Images Without Smear, Regardless of Lighting Conditions. Count on it For Reliable Visual Monitoring in Applications Where Accurate Color Reproduction And High Image Quality Are Critical.
